name: discord-self-bot
description: Favna#0001's Discord-Self-Bot for anyone to grant extreme power to their Discord usage

token.description: Your token. To get your token read this: https://github.com/Favna/Discord-Self-Bot/wiki/Installation-&-Setup#grabbing-your-discord-account-token

owner.description: Your User ID. To get your ID enable "Developer Mode" in Discord Settings -> Appearance -> Developer Mode then right click your own name anywhere and click "Copy ID"

heroku.description: Name you are giving this app? Case sensitive! Exact name as above!

googleapikey.description: OPTIONAL: If you already have a Google API key you can enter it here

imagekey.description: OPTIONAL: If you already have a Google Custom Search Engine key for images you can enter it here

searchkey.description: OPTIONAL: If you already have Google Custom Search Engine key for web searches you can enter it here

oxrkey.description: OPTIONAL: If you already have an Open Exchange Rates API key you can enter it here

moviedbkey.description: OPTIONAL: If you already have a TheMovieDatabase API key you can enter it here

steamkey.description: OPTIONAL: If you already have a Steam API key you can enter it here

igdbkey.description: OPTIONAL: If you already have an IGDB API key you can enter it

spotifyid.description: OPTIONAL: If you already have a Spotify App ID you can enter it here

spotifysecret.description: OPTIONAL: If you already have a Spotify App Secret you can enter it here

timezonedbkey.description: OPTIONAL: If you already have a TimezoneDB API key you can enter it here

kitsuid.description: OPTIONAL: Application ID for Kitsu.io's API. You can use the default value.

kitsukey.description: OPTIONAL: API key for Kitsu.io's API. You can use the default value.

webhookid.description: OPTIONAL: If you already have a Webhook ID you can enter it here

webhooktoken.description: OPTIONAL: If you already have a Webhook Token you can enter it here
